name: painted black - ViewVC CVS & SVN Browser
description:
http://viewvc.tigris.org/
http://viewvc.org

version 0.1.2

--[description]

ViewVC is an HTTP CVS & SVN repository frontend.  Most sites which use it keep the default page themes and classes, so using this on those sites is as simple as adding the domain to the style @-moz-document.

Please inform me here if you would like a site domain to be added to the style, to save you from adding it manually with each update.

Included Domains:

cvs.php.net
cvs.sourceforge.net
svn.apache.org
svn.sourceforge.net


--[relevant]

See also:
http://userstyles.org/styles/search/painted+black
style 5013

user.name: Daniel Ritchie (Honestly Illustrated)
